description: portrait bust of a man facing right, looking at viewer, wearing large lacy ruff and elaborate coat; chain around neck with medallion and pig at end
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

in plate around oval frame: [ARCHDUX BURGUN: PR BELGAR.UM. SERENESS: PR: ALBERTUS D AVS:]; below image in black: [The portrature of the most Illustrious/ Prince Albert, Archduke of Austria; Duke of Burgundie; and Prince of Belgia./ R. Elstrack sculp]; on verso stamped in black: [Pppp  ALBERT]; on sheet in pencil: [1-381]
title: Portrait of Prince Albert of Austria
